Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
This feature allows you to convert parts of a page's HTML to JSON. Which parts of a page are converted to JSON can be controlled by usage of the <cms:jsonpart> tag (from the OpenCms tag library) in your templates or formatters (or any other JSPs used for rendering a page).


This can be useful for reusing parts of the HTML of an OpenCms page in external applications.
